question_text: Which scenarios best describe the use of a Personal Area Network (PAN)? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Connecting a smartphone to a Bluetooth headset
Using Bluetooth to tether a tablet to a phone
Connecting to a public Wi-Fi hotspot
Pairing a smartwatch with a phone
correct_answer: Connecting a smartphone to a Bluetooth headset
Using Bluetooth to tether a tablet to a phone
Pairing a smartwatch with a phone
explanation: PAN describes short-range personal device communication, typically over Bluetooth. USB and public Wi-Fi are not PAN examples.
